about_the_game:
Maze Burrow is a Sokoban-inspired puzzle game that involves pushing and pulling blocks. Help the echidna escape its maze-like burrow by solving puzzles to activate the portal in each level and fight back against the moles!

Timeless Gameplay

Push and pull blocks into matching tiles to activate the level portal in over 60 levels of classic puzzle goodness. Use your wits to optimize solutions and aim for the lowest scores and time possible.


Traverse the Burrow

The moles have dug an elaborate burrow that contains many obstacles the echidna must overcome. Utilize switches and warps to tackle unpassable walls. Traverse through ice and mud, which change how the echidna can move blocks. Work with paired blocks, which move in tandem. These obstacles are more common as the echidna progresses throughout the burrow, and they often combine to create increasingly complex puzzles.


Boss Fights

Every now and then, the echidna will have a run-in with the moles and get a chance to show them who's boss! These unique levels add a hint of action to the puzzle-solving done throughout the burrow.

Free/Libre

Maze Burrow is free/libre software, and each purchase comes with the complete source code, allowing for unlimited modding potential. It's every modder's dream!

Maze Burrow is a Sokoban-inspired puzzle game that involves pushing and pulling blocks. Help the echidna escape its maze-like burrow by solving puzzles to activate the portal in each level and fight back against the moles!

Push and pull blocks into matching tiles to activate the level portal in over 60 levels of classic puzzle goodness. Use your wits to optimize solutions and aim for the lowest scores and time possible.

The moles have dug an elaborate burrow that contains many obstacles the echidna must overcome. Utilize switches and warps to tackle unpassable walls. Traverse through ice and mud, which change how the echidna can move blocks. Work with paired blocks, which move in tandem. These obstacles are more common as the echidna progresses throughout the burrow, and they often combine to create increasingly complex puzzles.

Every now and then, the echidna will have a run-in with the moles and get a chance to show them who's boss! These unique levels add a hint of action to the puzzle-solving done throughout the burrow.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian 9, Ubuntu 18.04, Linux Mint 19.2 Tina, Manjaro 19.0.2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, NVIDIA Geforce G100, ATI Radeon HD2900
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Debian 9 or Newer, Ubuntu 18.04 or Newer, Linux Mint 19.2 Tina or Newer, Manjaro 19.0.2 or Newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce G100 or better, ATI Radeon HD2900 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

short_description: An echidna wakes up one day to find its cozy burrow turned into a giant maze by an evil mole gang! Solve puzzles to progress through the burrow, defeat the mole gang, and escape to freedom in this Sokoban-inspired puzzler.
